outline:
1. heap, spring, wave, billow
    1. heap (of stones)
      1. over dead body
      2. alone
      3. used in ratifying a covenant
    2. waves (fig. of chastisement of Jehovah)
    3. spring
strongs_def: something rolled, i.e. a heap of stone or dung (plural ruins), by analogy, a spring of water (plural waves)
